7. Polygon Mesh

Additional Classes

gstBT_GeomObjWrapper class for gstSpatialObjects so that they all have nice generic properties to be handled by the partition class.
gstBT_NodeThis class represents nodes within the gstBinTree class.
gstBT_StackClass to linearize the traversal of the gstBinTree.
gstBT_StackElemClass to represent an element of the partition traversal stack.
gstBinTreeA particular type of spatial partition.
gstLineIntersectionInfoStores status of intersection of line with some object.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirstTwo_ParamFirst two intersections along line with object including parametric values (t1 and t2) of line where first two intersections occur.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirstTwo_ParamEdgeFirst two intersections along line coplanar with polygonal face including parametric values (t1 and t2) of line where first two intersections occur and includes pointers to the polygon's edges (e1 and e2) for the respective two intersections.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamFirst intersection along line with object including parametric value (t1) of line where first intersection occurs.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamNormalFirst intersection along line with object including parametric value (t1) of line where first intersection occurs and normal of surface at point of intersection.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamSpatObjFirst intersection along line with object including parametric value (t1) of line where first intersection occurs and pointer to gstSpatialObject intersected by line.
gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamTriPolyFirst intersection along line with object including parametric value (t1) of line where first intersection occurs and pointer to gstTriPoly intersected by line.
gstModifyBaseInterface to signal when a instance is modified.
gstNormalPolyPropertyFor assigning normals to vertices in a gstPolyMesh.
gstObjectIntersectionInfoStructure for various intersection tests.
gstOnePolyPropertyIdStructOne poly property with an ID.
gstPolyPropertyBaseBase class for property associated with an entire polygon or one of its vertices (ie.
gstPolyPropertyContainerContainer class to hold indexed property information of 1,2, and/or 3 dimensional quality pertaining to an entire polygon or to it's individual vertices.
gstPolyPropertyDoubleProperty storing double data associated with an entire polygon or one of its vertices (ie.
gstPolyPropertyPoint2DProperty storing gstPoint2D data associated with an entire polygon or one of its vertices (ie.
gstPolyPropertyPoint3DProperty storing gstPoint data associated with an entire polygon or one of its vertices (ie.
gstSpatialObjectBase class intended for all GHOST objects of spatial extent.
gstSpatialPartitionClass to act as a base class for all types of spatial partitions which will get imposed on GHOST objects.
gstThreePolyPropertyIdStructThree poly properties with an ID.
operator<<Insert operator for IntersectionType.
__declspec
